channel.title: Slayer Tut
channel.description: hay im having some trouble with my slayer, my slayer guy is trade able and if your right click him it come's up with *GET TASK* but when you click get task nothing atall come's up, you dont even get a tast.. could someone give me a hand revision is *508_*

item.title: Slayer Tut
item.dc:creator: @God_Pure1 God_Pure
item.description:
@God_Pure1 wrote:

On your server console or on client if you have this option, you should be able which packet it is sending, you have to edit what this packet does in your settings as far as I know, someone correct me if I am wrong, I didn’t really work with 508 much and its been a long time.

Read full topic
